text: Events from the year 1804 in Russia ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Alexander I ==Events== * * * * * * ==Births== * - Aleksey Khomyakov, Russian theologian, philosopher, poet and amateur artist who co-founded the Slavophile movement. (d. 1860) * - Mikhail Glinka, Russian composer and founder of the Russian nationalist school of classical music. (d. 1857) ==Deaths== * * * * Anna Matyushkina, courtier (b. 1722) * ==References== 1804 in Russia Category:Years of the 19th century in the Russian Empire
title: 1804 in Russia
